org.corfudb.universe.node.server.docker

Class DockerCorfuServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.universe.node.server.AbstractCorfuServer<CorfuServerParams,UniverseParams>
      • org.corfudb.universe.node.server.docker.DockerCorfuServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<CorfuServer>, Node, CorfuServer

    public class DockerCorfuServer
extends AbstractCorfuServer<CorfuServerParams,UniverseParams>
    Implements a docker instance representing a CorfuServer.

    • Method Detail

      • deploy

        public DockerCorfuServer deploy()
        Deploys a Corfu server / docker container
        Returns:
        current instance of the Node with the new state.

      • stop

        public void stop(Duration timeout)
        This method attempts to gracefully stop the Corfu server. After timeout, it will kill the Corfu server.
        Parameters:
        timeout - a duration after which the stop will kill the server
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server cannot be stopped.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Immediately kill the Corfu server.
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be killed.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Immediately kill and remove the docker container
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be killed.

      • getStress

        public Stress getStress()

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Symmetrically disconnect the server from the cluster. This partitions the container from all the others. The test runtime can still connect to this server.
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be disconnected

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(List<CorfuServer> servers)
        Symmetrically disconnect a server from a list of other servers, which creates a partial partition.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of servers to disconnect from.
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be disconnected

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause the container from docker network
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be paused

      • start

        public void start()
        Start a Node
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be started

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restart a Node
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the server can not be restarted

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect()
        Reconnect a server to the cluster
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be reconnected

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect(List<CorfuServer> servers)
        Reconnect a server to a list of servers.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of servers to reconnect.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resume a CorfuServer
        Throws:
        NodeException - this exception will be thrown if the node can not be resumed
